English: Give Autonomy to the Irishman

The One and True government

Napoleon's Legacy

The foolish compromises of Napoleon II have forced us to grant concessions to other European nations for the sake of peace. This great betrayal must be amended, and the Legacy of Napoleon the Great must be reborn!
The Cromwellian Spirit
The republic is too unstable! As Cromwell did once, so shall we restore order and peace with a new Lord Protector, otherwise our enemies will prevail over us.
The Danzig Coup

The republic of Danzig is staffed with our officials friendly to us, our king must merely lift his finger and an annexation bill is sure to come. Let us erase this disgusting by-product of the Napoleonic wars and return the city to its rightful owner.
Create The Central Industrial Region

The Central Industrial Region was one of the biggest economic projects of the Poland. The 5-year-long project was initiated by a famous Polish economist, deputy Prime Minister and Minister of the Treasury, Eugeniusz Kwiatkowski. Its goal was to create a heavy industrial center in the middle of the country, as far as possible from any borders, strengthen the Polish economy and reduce unemployment.
The Grand Duchy

Our lands once stretched from the Baltic Sea to Kiev, until the traitorous Poles took them away from us and forced us into their bloody union! Finally being free of the fools, the time has come to retake our rightful lands.
Last stand!
WE shall fight on the beaches, we shall fight against the American menace!
Retake the Indian Treaty Ports

For ages, the Indian subcontinent has been plagued by the most terrifying disease - Europeans. With our control over South Asia solidified, we can afford to consolidate our power even more - and even attempt to drive out the Foreigners.

Reclaim Louisiana!

The Crusade for Canada

Our northern neighbors, the Canadians, are unjustly exploited by upstart British nobles, who ran from their home after the British Revolution. To achieve peace in the New World, this imperialism must be put to an end.
Take back our Eastern Claims!
After the disastrous Wars of the Coalition, our rightful land in the Kingdom of Galicia was stolen by the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth. This was a terrible mistake
French: and now it falls upon us to mend the situation.

English: Finish the New Partitions of Poland!
It has become apparent that the lords of Poland are utterly incompetent at administrating their own realm. There is no point in having them keep holding onto land that was once Austrian.
Reintegrate Illyria

After the Wars of the Coalition against Napoleon, we were forced to acknowledge an independent, 'Illyrian' state in Croatian, and therefore, Austrian territory. However, with France losing their power in the region, and our diplomats further accumulating influence, we are able to reintegrate Illyria into our country.
Poland is No More!
With the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth off the map, we can once and for all wipe the pretense of a powerful Union between Poles and Lithuanians
Our Claim on the Trent Region

Expand our influence in the western Mediterranean Sea

Expand in Southern Italy

Ask for Catalonia

Give citizenship to the Caraibes

Now the Iberian has been united, let's continue this propagation of citizenship to our last asian colonies, the philipense
Reestablish the spanish armada
With the British fleet being divided there's place for the spanish armada to reestablish itself as one the strongest fleet in the world
We must stop USA's expansion
The USA have looked to expand west since the French Emperor Napoleon sold them Lousiana. It's time to put an end to their expansion! However, this will stop us from focusing on matters in the south.
Expand to the Mississippi!
Now that we stopped the USA, it's time to expand our border to the Mississippi river and take Louisiana!
Expansion in the south of USA's !

Acceptance of the Mayan people

Expansion in central america

We reign over the Bosniak crowns!

The Reconquest of Quebec

Quebec has, for many years, stayed under the control of the English. It is imperative that we take advantage of the current weak state of Canada - let Quebec, and the world, know that we are coming back for what is ours!
Reconquest of Prussia !

The Polish Patriots of Śląsk
We have saved the Poles from the Prussian imperialism in Śląsk!
Unite with the Galician Poles!
East and West Galician Poles are finally united under the flag of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth, they don't need to fear the Austrian black eagle!
All Poles are united

Expand our Germanic influence!
The pressure we put on Prussia gave us possibility to expand our influence in Germany
Expand our influence in the Baltic!
Since the Baltic riots and our intervention we tried our best to keep our control on the region. It's now time to give them citizenship.
Form the Baltic Empire!
We have united the Baltic people under one nation and we are ready to take our place as a great power!
Expand our German territory!
We must keep our hold on North Germany and pursuit the domination of the Baltic!
Continue the German Expansion!
Now that we established ourselves as a North German power, we must seek dominance over the whole North German region.
Continue the German Expansion!
Now that we established ourselves as a North German power, we must seek dominance over the whole North German region.
Denmark is ours!
We have entire control over the trade that is exiting the Baltic with the submission of Denmark!
Russian expansion!

We are the Master of the Baltic!
With the control of every Baltic Island, land spanning from Copenhagen to St Petersburg, we have proven ourselves to be the master of the Baltic Sea!
Annexation of the North German minors!
We have united all North German people under our flag and many are pressuring their government to join us!
Go beyond the Rhine!
We have to save the North German that are under the cruel rule of the French Empire!
The Lithuanian Question.
We claim to be the Baltic Empire but don't even protect every Baltic culture. It's our destiny to do so and we must protect the Lithuanians!
Acceptance of the North Germanic People!
Scandinavia and North Germany often sounds like it's the same place. Now, we're making it official!
The Annexation of Danzig
The city-state of Danzig is a valuable port within the Baltic sea. It's time to put pressure on their government, either with diplomacy or military force, to claim it into our Empire!
We are the Norwegian Empire!
Since the fall of the Viking North Sea Empire in the 11 century, we were looked at with despise and we even lost our naval supremacy. It's time to show to the world the heritage of the Viking!
Claim England!
The Nord See Empire owned England 800 years ago, it's time to claim that land as well and honor our heritage!
The Irish Question

We are Vikings!
Now that we have restored the Norwegian Empire to it's former glory, we can legitimately declare us as true heirs of the Viking legacy!
Acceptance of the British!

Acceptance of Scotland!
Now that we have reclaim Scotland, it's time to give the local population the same rights as the Danes, and integrate them into the glorious Scandinavian Empire!
Accept the Slovak !
It's been long since we have occupied slovak land and it's time to give them citizenship !
Acceptance_of_Scottish !
With the reconquest of the Scottish state, we give them citizenship, as we did in the past !
Reintegrate the Rhineland !
The Rhineland has always been a part of the The Holy Roman Empire before the Napoleonic wars and we now posses it once more !
Expansion in Italy !
North Italy is rightful The Holy Roman Empire claim and we have to make sure it stays that way !
Glory to the The Holy Roman Empire !
We have united the core territory of the The Holy Roman Empire, it's time to claim all losted land to expand it to it's glorious past border  !
Expansion in the Netherlands !
The Netherlands were historically a part of the The Holy Roman Empire and we have finally recover them !
Expansion in Switzerland !
The swiss are once again a part of the Holy Roman Empire like they should have stayed !
Finnish the Expansion in the Lowlands !
We have finally recovered the Lowlands, a historical region of the Holy Roman Empire taken by the French during the Revolution !
Expansion in Slovenia !
We have recovered the land loss to the Illigitimate Illyrian Duchy !
Form the Holy Roman Empire!

In 1806, after the battle of Austerliz and the defeat of the Austrian army, the Emperor Francis II dissolved the Holy Roman Empire, having no reality anymore. We have now recover the legitimacy to recreate it again and put Austria at the center!
Glory to India !
We have finally united India, it's time to make it's people prosper !
Acceptance of the bengali !
We own bengal and it's time to give it's people citizenship !
Acceptance of the south !
We own the south of India, it's time to grant them citizenship !
An Mein Volk !

So wenig fur Mein treues Volk, als fur Deutsche, bedarf es einer Rechenschaft uber die Ursachen des Krieges, welcher jetzt beginnt. Klar liegen dem unverblendeten Europa vor Augen. Wir erlagen der Uebermacht Frankreichs. Der Friede, der die Halfte Meiner Unterthanen mit entriB, gab uns seine Segnungen nicht
French: denn er schlug uns tiefere Wunden als selbst der Krieg. Das Mark des Landes ward ausgesogen, die Hauptfestungen bleiben vom Feinde besetzt, der Ackerbau ward gelähmt, sowie der sonst so hoch gebrachte Kunstfleiß unserer Städte. Die Freiheit des Handels ward gehemmt und dadurch die Quellen des Erwerbs und des Wohlstandes verstopft. Das Land ward ein Raub der Verarmung. Durch die strengste Erfüllung eingegangener Verbindlichkeiten hoffte Ich Meinem Volk Erleichterung zu bereiten, und den französischen Kaiser endlich überzeugen, daß es sein eigener Vortheil sey, Preußen seine Unabhängigkeit zu lassen. Aber Meine reinsten Absichten wurden durch Uebermuth und Treulosigkeit vereitelt, und nur zu deutlich sahen wir, daß des Kaisers Verträge mehr noch wie seine Kriege uns langsam verderben mußten. Jetzt ist der Augenblick gekommen, wo alle Täuschung über unsern Zustand aufhört. – Brandenburger, Preußen, Schlesier, Pommern, Litthauer! Ihr wißt, was Ihr seit fast sieben Jahren erduldet habt
German: Ihr wißt, was euer trauriges Loos ist, wenn wir den beginnenden Kampf nicht ehrenvoll enden. Erinnert Euch an die Vorzeit, an den großen Kurfürsten, den großen Friedrich. Bleibt eingedenk der Güter, die unter Ihnen Unsere Vorfahren blutig erkämpften: Gewissensfreiheit, Ehre, Unabhängigkeit, Handel, Kunstfleiß und Wissenschaft. – Gedenkt des großen Beispiels unserer mächtigen Verbündeten, der Russen
Polish: gedenkt der Spanier, der Portugiesen. Selbst kleinere Völker sind für gleiche Güter gegen mächtigere Feinde in den Kampf gezogen und haben den Sieg errungen. Erinnert Euch an die heldenmüthigen Schweizer und Niederländer. – Große Opfer werden von allen Ständen gefordert werden
Spanish: denn unser Beginnen ist groß, und nicht geringe die Zahl und die Mittel unserer Feinde. Ihr werdet jene lieber bringen für das Vaterland, für Euern angeborenen König, als für einen fremden Herrscher, der, wie so viele Beispiele lehren, Eure Söhne und Eure letzten Kräfte Zwecken widmen würde, die Euch ganz fremd sind. Vertrauen auf Gott, Ausdauer, Muth und der mächtige Beistand unserer Bundesgenossen werden unsern redlichen Anstrengungen siegreichen Lohn gewähren. – Aber, welche Opfer auch von Einzelnen gefordert werden mögen, sie wiegen die heiligen Güter nicht auf, für die wir sie hingeben, für die wir streiten und siegen müssen, wenn wir nicht aufhören wollen, Preußen und Deutsche zu seyn. Es ist der letzte, entscheidende Kampf, den wir bestehen, für unsere Existenz, unsere Unabhängigkeit, unsern Wohlstand. Keinen andern Ausweg gibt es, als einen ehrenvollen Frieden, oder einen ruhmvollen Untergang. Auch diesem würdet Ihr getrost entgegen gehen, um der Ehre willen
Italian: weil ehrlos der Preuße und der Deutsche nicht zu leben vermag. Allein wir dürfen mit Zuversicht vertrauen: Gott und unser fester Wille werden unserer gerechten Sache den Sieg verleihen, mit ihm einen sichern, glorreichen Frieden und die Wiederkehr einer glücklichen Zeit.

English: Reclaim Austrian Land !
We have reclaimed true austrian land that we lost to Bavaria due to Napoleon. Now, nobody can claim it again !
